post:
There's a client of mine selling the following server, as he no longer needs it.

<pre>
E3 1270v2
32GB RAM
4x2TB HDD + 120GB SSD, HW RAID, LSI MegaRaid 1GB Cache
10TB Bandwidth
/29 and /24
Buffalo @ CC
</pre>

The server is up for about 50+ days left in billing. It'll go for $200 for the remaining time left. 
If there's anyone interested, PM me and I'll give his contact.

Renewal with CC is 175$/month.
